title: Kan Pathian hmangaihna thuk zia
lyrics:
Kan Pathian hmangaihna thuk zia,
Zahngaihnain a khat a;
Buaina tinreng min zangkhaipui,
Mal min sawmsak fo thin hi.

Hmangaih Pathian a ni si. (2)

Thil an lo awm, an ral leh thin,
Mihring an ral, kumte nen;
A hmangaih erawh a ngai fo,
Chatuana dang chuang ngai lo.

Keinin vanduainaah kan ruat,
A hmangaihna lantirtu;
Mahse, thlaphan, mangan, buaina,
Lawm nan a siam ta zawk a.
